segments.text: I'm looking closely at the left side of this kitchen drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, quite young I'd say, attempting to scale a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up towards an open upper wall cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My gaze is drawn to the label inside: “COOKIE JAR,” and it's clearly filled with cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's actually reaching into the jar with one hand!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to catch the cookies or as a makeshift lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly unstable, with its legs splayed and tilted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems to be on the verge of tipping backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really concerned he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched so precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This sneaky little mission for cookies is definitely risky business.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame his mischievous figure perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't hurt himself trying to get those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
